Keywords: Cosmic , Eternal , Warrior
Real Name: Gilgamesh
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Hindering, Destroy Blocking
GODS HIDDEN AMONG MORTALS: Until Gilgamesh makes an attack, takes damage, or is the last character on your force, he can't be targeted by non-adjacent opposing characters.
HERO WITH A THOUSAND FACES: Close Combat Expert, Combat Reflexes.
ONE STOOD AGAINST ALL: Quake. When he uses it, after resolutions choose one: give an action token to all hit targets -or- all hit targets can use Earthbound/Neutralized until your next turn.

December 8, 2021
Goop
He is very hard hitting opening up with CCE for 12/5. Defense is very solid too with -2 reducers going all the way down. The quake is a nice option but pretty situational. The traited CCE and CR is the good stuff here making him hit hard and hard to hit.
